mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member ( email, name, phone, nickname, password, status, profile_image_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ( #{email}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{status}, #{profileImage.imageId}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM Member WHERE email = #{email})
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM Member WHERE nickname = #{nickname})
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM Member WHERE phone = #{phone})
SELECT m.member_id, m.email, m.name, m.phone, m.nickname, m.profile_image_id, i.url FROM Member m LEFT JOIN Image i ON m.profile_image_id = i.image_id WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
